meanings.definition: A malignant tumor derived from fibrous connective tissue.
meanings.sent1: The fibrosarcoma was removed during surgery.
meanings.sent2: Doctors diagnosed her with fibrosarcoma after the biopsy.
meanings.sent3: The fibrosarcoma decided to take a vacation from growing.
meanings.sent4: Her fibrosarcoma was a tangled web of trouble.
meanings.sent5: The fibrosarcoma spread like wildfire, consuming everything in its path.

meanings.definition: A type of cancer that originates in fibrous tissue.
meanings.sent1: He underwent chemotherapy to treat the fibrosarcoma.
meanings.sent2: The fibrosarcoma had spread to his lungs.
meanings.sent3: The fibrosarcoma threw a party in his body, uninvited.
meanings.sent4: Her fibrosarcoma was a silent intruder, lurking in the shadows.
meanings.sent5: The fibrosarcoma was a relentless enemy, never backing down.
